title: Manage VBS Slot Release
description: Due to increased productivity, the terminal can handle more trucks. The gate manager decides to release more appointment slots.

tasks.description: Analyze current truck turnaround times and gate queue lengths.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager notes that turnaround times are low and there are no queues, indicating spare capacity.

tasks.description: Decide to release an additional 20 appointment slots per hour for the next 4 hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: A decision is made to increase capacity.

tasks.description: Update the Vehicle Booking System (VBS) to make the new slots available to trucking companies.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new slots are successfully added to the VBS and become available for booking.
